name: Boomdandy
ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

execution.description: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

information.customMessage: If executed, trigger mass death and pointing mechanic.
